MemoryInfobox.name: Power Corrupts All
MemoryInfobox.description: 'In hopes it would help, Barnabas set out alone to search for the Treasure Hunter's Apple of Eden|artifact. Kassandra went after him, fearing the worst.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories'

General_Description: '''Power Corrupts All''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra went to search for [[Barnabas]] after learning from [[Herodotos]] of his attempt to search for the [[Treasure Hunter's Apple of Eden|prized treasure]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra confronted Barnabas and was able to free him of the Apple's control. The two reminisced on their travels and discussed Kassandra's immortality.
